subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
Réseau Financité (Financité), born in 1987, gathers citizens and organisations that wish more solidarity and responsibility in dealings with money. Together, they represent a citizen movement that fights daily to reinforce social links in finance respecting humans and their environment. 
Financité works in three Departments: 
* Education: stimulates and accompanies collective initiatives regarding responsible and solidarity-based finance. This support is done through educational work, knowledge and animation production. 
* Research & Innovation: develops activities, goods and services to reach a better level of responsible and solidary-based finance.  
* Advocacy: promotes its network’s positions and requests in favor of a more responsible and solidary-based finance.
